medical_history.chief_complaint: A large mass in the right breast with associated symptoms including skin redness, pinprick-like pain, and nipple ulceration.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient first noticed a bean-like hard mass in the right breast one year ago, which gradually increased in size to that of a soccer ball. She experienced skin redness, pinprick-like pain, and nipple ulceration over this time. Additionally, she had episodes of unconsciousness due to severe hypoglycemia occurring initially in April 2016 and again six days later.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient was diagnosed with nasopharyngeal carcinoma 20 years ago, with no recurrence after radiotherapy.
